---
title: "anterior_to_posterior"
author: "nforde"
date: "April 20, 2018"
output: html_document
---
Run this after func_struct_tidy.Rmd. It will calculate the mean functional connectivity strength and track density for homotopic connections ordered Anterior posterior (divided in 10 bins) 

## get libraries/set paths
```{r}
library(igraph)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(broom)
library(knitr)
library(car)
library(multcomp)
library(lubridate)
library(lme4)
library(cowplot)

outdir <- "/projects/nforde/POND/stats"
atlas <- "glasser"
```

```{r set POND stuff}
## set all the paths
#POND
pond_demographics <- read.csv("/projects/nforde/POND/clinical/POND_06JUN2018_pp.csv")
QCfunc <- read.csv("/projects/nforde/POND/rsMRI/bold.csv")
QCdwi <- read.csv("/projects/nforde/POND/dtifit/qc.csv")
QCdwi.class <- read.csv("/projects/nforde/POND/dtifit/QC/Classified.csv")
hand <- read.csv("/projects/nforde/POND/clinical/handedness.csv")
SCQ <- read.csv("/projects/nforde/POND/clinical/SCQ_Data_23_July_2018.csv")
WISCV <- read.csv("/projects/nforde/POND/clinical/WISC_5_Data_24_July_2018.csv")

edgedir <- "/projects/nforde/POND/edges"

#merge diff sources of demog and QC data
demogs <- pond_demographics %>% 
  merge(WISCV[c("Subject","WISC_V_FSIQ")], by.x="SUBJECT", by.y="Subject", all.x=TRUE)

#do some organising and renaming
demogs <- filter(demogs, !is.na(DOB)) %>% filter(!is.na(POND_DATE))
demogs$Age <- interval(ymd(demogs$DOB), ymd(demogs$POND_DATE)) %>% as.duration() %>% as.numeric(unit="years") %>% round(digits=2)
demogs$sex <- demogs$GENDER
demogs$dx <- NA
demogs$dx[demogs$RESEARCH_CONFIRM_DIAG_STD=="1"] <- 'ASD'
demogs$dx[demogs$RESEARCH_CONFIRM_DIAG_STD=="2" | demogs$RESEARCH_CONFIRM_DIAG_STD=="6"] <- 'ADHD'
demogs$dx[demogs$RESEARCH_CONFIRM_DIAG_STD=="3"] <- 'OCD'
demogs$dx[demogs$RESEARCH_CONFIRM_DIAG_STD=="10"] <- 'HC'
demogs$dx[demogs$RESEARCH_CONFIRM_DIAG_STD=="15"] <- 'GAD'
IQ <- data.frame(demogs$WASI_FSIQ_2, demogs$WASI_II_FSIQ_2, demogs$WASI_FSIQ_4, demogs$WASI_II_FSIQ_4, demogs$WISC_IV_FSIQ, demogs$WISC_V_FSIQ)
demogs$FSIQ_any <- apply(IQ, 1, mean, na.rm=TRUE)
demogs$FSIQ_any[demogs$FSIQ_any == "NaN"] <- NA
demogs$NDDdx <- NA
demogs$NDDdx[demogs$dx == "ASD" | demogs$dx == "OCD" | demogs$dx == "ADHD"] <- "NDD"
demogs$NDDdx[demogs$dx == "HC"] <- "HC"
  
### reduce the demographic data and merge if other sources
demogs <- demogs[c("SUBJECT","dx", "NDDdx", "Age", "sex", "FSIQ_any", "AB21GCCS", "RBSCPT",
                        "VAB2CP", "OB_SUB", "COM_SUB", "ADHD_I_SUB", "ADHD_HI_SUB", "TPOCS_TOT", "CB68TPTOT", "CB68TPTS")] %>%
  merge(SCQ[c("Subject","SCQTOT")], by.x="SUBJECT", by.y="Subject", all.x=TRUE) %>%
  merge(hand[c("ID","Handed")], by.x="SUBJECT", by.y="ID", all.x=TRUE) %>%
  merge(QCfunc, by.x="SUBJECT", by.y="subject_id") 
demogs$scanner <-NA
demogs$scanner[demogs$spacing_tr!="1.5"] <- 'trio'
demogs$scanner[demogs$spacing_tr=="1.5"] <- 'prisma'


#add 0 infront of 88 subjects
for (i in 1:nrow(demogs)) {
  if (startsWith(as.character(demogs$SUBJECT[i]), "88")) {
    demogs$SUBJECT[i] <- paste0("0", demogs$SUBJECT[i])
  }
}
#add prefix to sub name
demogs$subid <- paste0("sub-",demogs$SUBJECT)

demogs <- unique(demogs)

demogs <- demogs %>% group_by(subid) %>%
  top_n(-1, fd_mean)

QCdwi.class <- QCdwi.class %>% separate(ID, "subid", sep="/") 

demogs <- merge(demogs, QCdwi[c("subject", "shell", "in.ex")], by.x= "subid", by.y = "subject", all.x=TRUE) %>% 
  merge(QCdwi.class[c("subid", "PC1", "cutree.res.hc..k...3.")], by="subid", all.x=TRUE)

```

names(comp_demogs)[names(comp_demogs) == 'Estimated.IQ..Total.IQ'] <- 'IQ'
names(comp_demogs)[names(comp_demogs) == 'subject_id'] <- 'subid'

```{r define_funcs}
anterior_posterior <- function(subids, edgedir) {
  AP <- data.frame("subid" = subids, 
                      "AP1" = numeric(length(subids)),
                      "AP2" = numeric(length(subids)),
                      "AP3" = numeric(length(subids)),
                      "AP4" = numeric(length(subids)),
                      "AP5" = numeric(length(subids)),
                      "AP6" = numeric(length(subids)),
                      "AP7" = numeric(length(subids)),
                      "AP8" = numeric(length(subids)),
                      "AP9" = numeric(length(subids)),
                      "AP10" = numeric(length(subids)))
        
  AP[ ,2:ncol(AP)] <- numeric(nrow(AP)*(ncol(AP)-1))
  
  Z_AP <- AP
  DW_AP <- AP
  
  for (i in 1:length(subids)) {
    subid <- AP$subid[i]
    edge.file <- file.path(edgedir, paste(subid, atlas, "edge_metrics.csv", sep="_")) 
      
    if (file.exists(edge.file)) {
      edges <- read.csv(edge.file, header =TRUE)
      edgesHO <- filter(edges, FCtype == "Homotopic")
      edgesHO$y_mean <- (edgesHO$V1y + edgesHO$V2y)/2 
      
      edgesHOnonzero <- subset(edgesHO, length > 0)
      #edgesHO <- within(edgesHO, AP_quant <- as.integer(cut(y_mean, quantile(y_mean, probs=0:20/20), include.lowest=TRUE)))
      edgesHO <- within(edgesHO, AP_quant <- as.integer(cut(y_mean, quantile(y_mean, probs=0:10/10), include.lowest=TRUE)))
      
      ### making 1 = quantile 10 etc so 1 is anterior and 10 mostp posterior
      Z_AP$AP1[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "10")$theseZ, na.rm=TRUE)
      Z_AP$AP2[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "9")$theseZ, na.rm=TRUE)
      Z_AP$AP3[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "8")$theseZ, na.rm=TRUE)
      Z_AP$AP4[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "7")$theseZ, na.rm=TRUE)
      Z_AP$AP5[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "6")$theseZ, na.rm=TRUE)
      Z_AP$AP6[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "5")$theseZ, na.rm=TRUE)
      Z_AP$AP7[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "4")$theseZ, na.rm=TRUE)
      Z_AP$AP8[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "3")$theseZ, na.rm=TRUE)
      Z_AP$AP9[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "3")$theseZ, na.rm=TRUE)
      Z_AP$AP10[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "1")$theseZ, na.rm=TRUE)

      DW_AP$AP1[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "10")$raw, na.rm=TRUE)
      DW_AP$AP2[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "9")$raw, na.rm=TRUE)
      DW_AP$AP3[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "8")$raw, na.rm=TRUE)
      DW_AP$AP4[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "7")$raw, na.rm=TRUE)
      DW_AP$AP5[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "6")$raw, na.rm=TRUE)
      DW_AP$AP6[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "5")$raw, na.rm=TRUE)
      DW_AP$AP7[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "4")$raw, na.rm=TRUE)
      DW_AP$AP8[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "3")$raw, na.rm=TRUE)
      DW_AP$AP9[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "2")$raw, na.rm=TRUE)
      DW_AP$AP10[i] <- mean(filter(edgesHO, AP_quant == "1")$raw, na.rm=TRUE)

    } else {
      print(paste(edge.file, "does not exist"))
      Z_AP[i,2:ncol(Z_AP)] <- NA
      DW_AP[i,2:ncol(DW_AP)] <- NA
    }
  }
  return(list("Z_AP"=Z_AP,"DW_AP"=DW_AP))
}
      
```
## Run 
```{r run POND}

demogs <- demogs %>% filter(fd_mean < 0.4) %>% filter(size_t > 100) ### dwi data filtered in analyses

subids <- demogs$subid

AP <- anterior_posterior(subids, edgedir)

APZ <- AP$Z_AP
APDW <- AP$DW_AP ####not very many homotopic pairs have structural connections

```

```{r run COMP}

comp_demogs <- comp_demogs %>% filter(fd_mean < 0.4) %>% filter(size_t > 200) ### dwi data filtered in analyses

comp_subids <- comp_demogs$subid

comp_AP <- anterior_posterior(comp_subids, comp_edgedir)

comp_APZ <- comp_AP$Z_AP
comp_APDW <- comp_AP$DW_AP ####not very many homotopic pairs have structural connections

```

```{r org pond}
apQZ <- APZ %>%
   gather(apQ, Z, starts_with("AP")) 

apQDW <- APDW %>%
   gather(apQ, DW, starts_with("AP")) 

APQ <- demogs %>%
  merge(apQZ[c("subid","apQ","Z")], by="subid") %>%
  merge(apQDW[c("subid","apQ","DW")], by=c("subid","apQ"), all.x =TRUE) %>%
  filter(Age > 6, dx != "GAD", !is.na(dx))

APQ_trio <- subset(APQ, scanner =="trio" & shell == "single")
APQ_prisma <- subset(APQ, scanner =="prisma")

```

```{r org comp}
comp_apQZ <- comp_APZ %>%
   gather(apQ, Z, starts_with("AP")) 

comp_apQDW <- comp_APDW %>%
   gather(apQ, DW, starts_with("AP")) 

APQ_comp <- comp_demogs %>%
  merge(comp_apQZ[c("subid","apQ","Z")], by="subid") %>%
  merge(comp_apQDW[c("subid","apQ","DW")], by=c("subid","apQ"), all.x =TRUE)
  
```

  geom_jitter(width = 0.3, size = 1, alpha=0.5) + geom_smooth(span = 0.5) +ylim(0,0.04) +
  ylab("Track Density") + theme(legend.position = "none")

pltDW_AP_comp_Age <- ggplot(filter(APQ_comp, QC_clust != 2, exclude == "in", !is.na(DW)), aes(x=Age, y=DW , color = apQordered)) + 
  geom_jitter(width = 0.3, size = 1, alpha=0.5) + geom_smooth(span = 0.5) +ylim(0,0.04) +
  ylab("Track Density") + theme(legend.position = "none")

fig_AP_Age <- plot_grid(pltZ_AP_trio_Age, pltZ_AP_prisma_Age, pltZ_AP_comp_Age, pltDW_AP_trio_Age, NULL, pltDW_AP_comp_Age, align="hv", ncol = 3)
fig_AP_Age
fig_AP_Age.file <- paste(outdir, "AP_Age.png", sep="/")
ggsave(fig_AP_Age.file, fig_AP_Age, dpi=300, width = 30, height = 18, units = "cm")
